productDescriptions2018.title: Nocturnal Launchpad Universal Lighted Crossbow Nocks
productDescriptions2018.author: Nick R. Key
productDescriptions2018.longdescription:
Easy to install and easy to use, Nocturnal® Launchpad Universal Lighted Crossbow Nocks make it easier to see your shot and find your arrow in any light. Designed for higher crossbow arrow speeds, these nocks feature a tough, 1-piece aluminum housing to protect the nock's battery and LED during high-speed flight and impact. Designed to fit nearly all crossbolt brands and models, these nocks feature a custom-fit, micro-adjustable barrel end for a reliable performance fit. Nocks also come with a second grey collet to fit a wider range of arrows. Helping crossbow hunters see arrow impacts under any light and find arrows on pass through shots, these ultra-strong nocks feature Nockturnal's game-changing, shot-activated lighting system for a foolproof glow to help you retrieve your arrows. Easy and reliable, the On/Off indexed nock end provides added safety and an easy ON/OFF design. Nocks come with a reusable c-clip to prevent lighting during storage. Made in USA.

  • Lighted nocks for crossbow hunters
  • Helps crossbow hunters see arrow impacts and find arrows on pass through shots
  • Tough, 1-piece aluminum housing - protects nock during high-speed flight and impact
  • Custom-fit, micro-adjustable barrel end - reliable performance fit
  • Fits nearly all crossbolt brands and models
  • On/Off indexed nock end
  • Comes with a reusable c-clip - prevents lighting during storage
